about.title: Who am I?
about.p1: Hello! my name is Savini Roza, I'm 20 years old, I live in Sorocaba, Sao Paulo, Brazil. I'm a Web Developer, with 2 years of experience, I am focused on Front-End and I also have a vocation for Marketing, Design and Character Illustration.
about.p2: I'm a gamer, I particularly like JRPGs, rhythm games and interactive storytelling. I also like to cook, especially making sweets. Besides, I love to travel, mountainous destinations are my favorites, I love visiting new places, trying new things, hiking, and shopping.
about.p3: I started studying the technology area at the age of 14, when I started a course for Internet Computing at Etec Prof. Elias Miguel Júnior, in Votorantim, where I was introduced to Programming Logic and Web Development, I graduated in 2017, and in 2018 I started studying System Analysis and Development at Fatec, in Sorocaba.
about.p4: In the middle of 2018, I got an internship at Melhor Escola, where I worked with SiteOps, I registered schools and updated their information on the platform. 1 year later, I started my internship in the development area, that's when I learned how to make Landing Pages using basic Front-End, and I was also introduced to other tools like Git, Laravel, and Wordpress.
about.p5: At the beginning of 2020 I started a new journey at Tecnologia Única, and currently I work there as a Junior Web Developer, where I had a deeper contact with MVC architecture using ASP.NET, I learned how to use Razor and Angular, in addition I learned to use Marketing automation tools, like RD Station, for me, there is an environment of constant learning, and the expectation is growing more and more in development area.
